sentences.english: He decided to turn over a new leaf and study harder.
sentences.chinese: 他決定要改過自新而且用功讀書。

sentences.english: It's time you amended your ways.
sentences.chinese: 是你改過自新的時候了。

sentences.english: So he then turned over a new leaf and decided to drop the pranks and tried his best to study.
sentences.chinese: 所以後來他改過自新，決定停止做惡作劇並努力學習。

sentences.english: I just wanted to get my own heart right before God.
sentences.chinese: 我只希望能夠在上帝面前改過自新。

sentences.english: A special group has been set up in the school to help her.
sentences.chinese: 學校爲此成立了一個特別小組，以幫助她改過自新。

sentences.english: He has straightened up and make something of himself.
sentences.chinese: 他已改過自新，並決心成爲一個有所作爲的人。

sentences.english: He decided to turn over a new leaf. He would live simply and regain the respect of his family.
sentences.chinese: 他決定改過自新，艱苦樸素，重新得到家人的尊敬。
